description:
After settling the matter with Ozu and reflecting on a couple of things with Shouma, Yoshino and Kirishima have a chat. What is the status of their bet?
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: En vrai, je veux t`épouser (3e partie)
Honne o Ieba Kekkon Shitai: Kouhen
To Be Honest, I Want to Marry You, Part Three
本音を言えば結婚したい 後編
